original: intros net h inp os st' ms h' e Hreachable HhandleInput HinLog. assert (In e (log (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h st' h'))) as HinUpdatedLog. { rewrite <- HinLog. apply in_map. apply in_map_iff. exists e. split; auto. } unfold applied_implies_input_state. right. reflexivity.
